columns.text: The goal of the task is to prepare the post-merger balance sheet according to the purchase method of accounting.

First of all, ***what is the purchase method of accounting?***

When creating a balance sheet for the merger we must show new assets and liabilities. In the purchase method of accounting, ***the acquisition of the new company is analyzed as an investment***. The fair market value of the acquired company is reported. On the other hand, the liabilities of the acquired company are subtracted from the fair value of the assets. 

We also calculate goodwill (the amount paid by the acquirer on the net value of the assets and liabilities of the acquired company), which is the difference between the purchase price and the market value of the net assets acquired.
